data.title: Gethsemane Baptist Temple
data.meta_description: A BIG THANK YOU to all of the VBS volunteers that so willingly gave of their time and talents not only last week but for the last several weeks. We couldn’t have done it without every one of you and you will never know just how much you are appreciated!! The sign up sheet is…
data.text:
A BIG THANK YOU to all of the VBS volunteers that so willingly gave of their time and talents not only last week but for the last several weeks. We couldn’t have done it without every one of you and you will never know just how much you are appreciated!!

The sign up sheet is posted for children’s camp, for elementary grade children, July 1–5. The signup deadline is next Sunday, June 16. See Tony for more information and for an agreement to be signed by all participating youth.

The SC Republican Primary is Tuesday, June 11. Watch 3rd congressional, State House & 10th Circuit Solicitor candidates speak: rumble.com/user/andersonscgop

Sunday, June 16, Scott Davis is starting another discipleship class in the Activity building, 10:00am-11:00am.

A look ahead…..

Sunday, June 16 is Fathers Day

Sunday, June 23 is Family Day

Sunday, June 30 is Patriotic Day

Pray for our Missionary of the week: Samuel & Molly Fried, Radio Ministry to Israel

This Week’s Calendar of Events

Sunday, June 9

5:30pm – Prayer Groups (all ages)

Monday, June 10

6:30pm – Seek The Truth Addiction & Support Ministry

Tuesday, June 11

10:00am – Ladies Visitation

Wednesday, June 12

5:00pm – Church-wide Visitation

6:00pm – Tract Ministry

6:30pm – Discovery Bible Clubs

7:00pm – Teen Church

Thursday, June 13

1:30pm – Ladies Knitting Class/fellowship hall

7:00pm – Bible College

7:00pm – WGGS TV-16 Broadcast

THE PASTOR’S CORNER

Thank you is in order to all our VBS Workers! May the Lord bless you back double for all your work in getting the Gospel in the children!

Your friend,

Preacher Sam
